## EditorPluginProps interface

Props for the component of an \[\[EditorPlugin\]\]

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface EditorPluginProps<S extends StateType = StateType, Config extends {} = {}>
```

## Properties

| Property                                                             | Type                                                              | Description                                                                                               |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [autofocusRef](./internal__plugin.editorpluginprops.autofocusref.md) | React.RefObject&lt;HTMLInputElement &amp; HTMLTextAreaElement&gt; | Ref to use for an input element. The element will receive focus, when the plugin is focused.              |
| [config](./internal__plugin.editorpluginprops.config.md)             | Config                                                            | Plugin configuration                                                                                      |
| [editable](./internal__plugin.editorpluginprops.editable.md)         | boolean                                                           | <code>true</code> if the document is currently editable                                                   |
| [focused](./internal__plugin.editorpluginprops.focused.md)           | boolean                                                           | <code>true</code> if the document is currently focused                                                    |
| [id](./internal__plugin.editorpluginprops.id.md)                     | string                                                            | ID of the document                                                                                        |
| [state](./internal__plugin.editorpluginprops.state.md)               | StateTypeReturnType&lt;S&gt;                                      | Current state of the document, see [StateTypeReturnType](./internal__plugin-state.statetypereturntype.md) |

## Methods

| Method                                                                                     | Description                                          |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| [renderIntoSettings(children)](./internal__plugin.editorpluginprops.renderintosettings.md) | Allows the plugin to render into the plugin settings |
| [renderIntoToolbar(children)](./internal__plugin.editorpluginprops.renderintotoolbar.md)   | Allows the plugin to render buttons into the toolbar |
